original: de bsgoms pa'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das aom badzra mu:zhes pas gshegs par bya'o //

translated: Also, Om namo bhagavate aparajitaya and so forth, should be recited once.üîΩAlso, Om namo bhagavate ushnisha vijaya ya and so forth, should be recited once.

analyzed: rdo rje'i dum bu la skad cig gis /

original: bzo bo gcig gis nyi ma gcig la dpa' bo'i rim pas sku gzugs bya'o //
analyzed: bzo bo gcig gis nyi ma gcig la dpa' bo'i rim pas sku gzugs bya'o //
translated: One artisan should make the image in the hero's stage in one day.

original: byas nas kyang bdag nyid kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la yi ge rnams dgod pa dang bsgom pa dang chu dbul ba la sogs pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ni man ngag go //
analyzed: byas nas kyang bdag nyid kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la yi ge rnams dgod pa dang bsgom pa dang chu dbul ba la sogs pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ni man ngag go //
translated: And having made it, one should accomplish it by placing the syllables on the image of the Blessed One, meditating, offering water, and so on, according to one's own stage. This is the instruction.

original: de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should request the departure.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ni rtag tu gnas te bkur sti la sogs pa bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ni rtag tu gnas te bkur sti la sogs pa bya'o zhes so //
translated: The image of the Blessed One always abides, so one should make offerings and so on.
